SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Server
Direct Known Subclasses:
RmiServer, SocketServer
public abstract class Server extends Object
The abstract class Server serves as a base class for server implementations. It manages games and their corresponding threads, as well as players and messages. Each protocol-specific implementation of a server calls for general methods in Server.java. The class also contains a static initializer that starts a thread to monitor players disconnections.
See Also:
  • RmiServer
  • SocketServer

  • Method Details

    • getGames

      public static Map<UUID,Integer> getGames()
      Gets an unmodifiable view of the games managed by the server.
      Returns:
      a map of game IDs to the number of players in each game

    • getAvailableGamesServer

      public static Map<UUID,String> getAvailableGamesServer(String username)
      Gets the games available to a player. The method iterates over the games and removes the ones that are closed or have all the players disconnected.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player
      Returns:
      a map of game IDs to the names of the games available to the player

    • removeGame

      public static void removeGame(UUID game, GameThread gameThread)
      Remove the game if it is closed or if all the players disconnect.
      Parameters:
      game - the UUID of the game to remove
      gameThread - the GameThread of the game to remove

    • isOffline

      public static boolean isOffline(String username)
      General Server method to check if a player is offline.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player
      Returns:
      true if the player is offline, false otherwise

    • createGame

      public static UUID createGame(int numberOfPlayers, String gameName)
      General Server method to create a new game with the specified number of players and starts its thread.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - the number of players in the game (between 2 and 4 inclusive)
      Returns:
      the unique ID of the created game, or null if the number of players is out of range

    • joinGame

      public static boolean joinGame(UUID game, String player)
      General Server method to join a player to a game.
      Parameters:
      game - the unique ID of the game to join
      player - the username of the player to join the game
      Returns:
      true if the player was successfully joined to the game, false otherwise

    • drawCardServer

      public static Integer drawCardServer(UUID game, String player, Integer position)
      General Server method to draw a card.
      Parameters:
      game - the unique ID of the game
      player - the username of the player drawing the card
      position - the index of the card to draw
      Returns:
      the ID of the drawn card, or null if the card could not be drawn

    • placeCardServer

      public static Boolean placeCardServer(UUID game, String player, Coordinates coordinates, Integer cardId)
      General Server method to place a card on the board.
      Parameters:
      game - the unique ID of the game
      player - the username of the player placing the card
      coordinates - the coordinates of the card placement
      cardId - the ID of the card to place
      Returns:
      true if the card was successfully placed, false otherwise

    • isValidPlayer

      public static boolean isValidPlayer(String username, String password)
      General Server method to check whether the given credentials are valid (size less than 16 and username is not reused)
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player
      password - the password of the player
      Returns:
      true if the given credentials are valid, false otherwise

    • sendMessage

      public static void sendMessage(UUID game, ThreadMessage message)
      Sends a message to a specified game. The method uses a synchronized block to safely interact with the message queue of the game.
      Parameters:
      game - the unique ID of the game to send the message to
      message - the message to be sent to the game

    • getGameStateServer

      public static GameState getGameStateServer(UUID game, String username)
      General Server method to get the current state of a game.
      Parameters:
      game - the unique ID of the game
      username - the username of the player
      Returns:
      the current state of the game

    • getScoreMapServer

      public static HashMap<String,Integer> getScoreMapServer(UUID game, String username)
      General Server method to get the players score map.
      Parameters:
      game - the unique ID of the game
      username - the username of the player requesting the score map
      Returns:
      a map of player usernames to their scores

    • getHandServer

      public static ArrayList<Integer> getHandServer(UUID game, String username)
      General Server method to get the hand of cards of the main player.
      Parameters:
      game - the unique ID of the game
      username - the username of the player
      Returns:
      a list of card IDs representing the player's hand

    • setStartingCardServer

      public static boolean setStartingCardServer(UUID game, String username, boolean frontSideUp)
      General Server method to set the starting card.
      Parameters:
      game - the unique ID of the game
      username - the username of the player setting the starting card
      frontSideUp - a boolean indicating if the card is placed front side up
      Returns:
      true if the card was successfully set, false otherwise

    • choosePersonalObjectiveServer

      public static boolean choosePersonalObjectiveServer(UUID game, String username, Integer objectiveId)
      General Server method used by a player to choose his personal objective at the start of a game.
      Parameters:
      game - the unique ID of the game
      username - the username of the player choosing the personal objective
      objectiveId - the ID of the personal objective chosen by the player the objective ID is chosen between the two options fetch by the player at the start of the game
      Returns:
      true if the personal objective was successfully chosen, false otherwise

    • choosePlayerColorServer

      public static boolean choosePlayerColorServer(UUID game, String username, Color playerColor)
      General Server method used by a player to choose his color at the start of a game.
      Parameters:
      game - the unique ID of the game
      username - the username of the player choosing the color
      playerColor - the color chosen by the player
      Returns:
      true if the color was successfully chosen, false otherwise

    • getHandColorServer

      public static ArrayList<Resource> getHandColorServer(UUID game, String username, String usernameRequiredData)
      General Server method to get the hand colors of a player. It's used to fetch the hand colors of the opponents to show the back of the cards to the player.
      Parameters:
      game - the unique ID of the game
      username - the username of the player requesting the hand colors
      usernameRequiredData - the username of the player whose hand colors are requested
      Returns:
      a list of card IDs representing the hand colors of the player

    • getHandTypeServer

      public static ArrayList<Boolean> getHandTypeServer(UUID game, String username, String usernameRequiredData)
      General Server method to get the hand types of a player. It's used to fetch the hand types of the opponents to show the type of the cards to the player.
      Parameters:
      game - the unique ID of the game
      username - the username of the player requesting the hand types
      usernameRequiredData - the username of the player whose hand types are requested
      Returns:
      a list of booleans indicating if the cards are gold

    • getBoardServer

      public static HashMap<Coordinates,Integer> getBoardServer(UUID game, String username, String usernameRequiredData)
      General Server method to get the board of a player.
      Parameters:
      game - the unique ID of the game
      username - the username of the player requesting the board
      usernameRequiredData - the username of the player whose board is requested
      Returns:
      a map of coordinates to card IDs representing the player's board

      usernameRequiredData - the username of the player whose placing order is requested
      Returns:

    • getVisibleCardsServer

      public static ArrayList<Integer> getVisibleCardsServer(UUID game, String username)

      Parameters:
      game - the unique ID of the game
      username - the username of the player requesting the visible cards
      Returns:
      a list of card IDs representing the visible cards in the draw area

    • getBackSideDecksServer

      public static ArrayList<Integer> getBackSideDecksServer(UUID game, String username)
      General Server method to fetch the decks in a draw area of a player. It's needed to show the player the backside color of the decks.
      Parameters:
      game - the unique ID of the game
      username - the username of the player requesting the decks
      Returns:
      the ID of the first card of a deck in the draw area

    • getValidPlacementsServer

      Parameters:
      game - the unique ID of the game
      username - the username of the player requesting the valid placements
      Returns:
      a list of coordinates representing the valid placements for cards on the board

    • getStartingCardServer

      public static Integer getStartingCardServer(UUID game, String username)
      General Server method for a player to get its starting card. The method is used to fetch the starting card of the player at the start of the game.
      Parameters:
      game - the unique ID of the game
      username - the username of the player
      Returns:
      the ID of the starting card of the player

      username - the username of the player
      Returns:
      the username of the player in turn

    • waitUpdate

      public static WaitState waitUpdate(UUID game, String username)
      General Server method used by the client to wait updates from the server.
      Parameters:
      game - the unique ID of the game
      username - the username of the player
      Returns:
      the current state of the player's turn

      public static void postChatServer(UUID game, String username, String message, String receiver)
      General Server method to post a chat message.
      Parameters:
      game - the unique ID of the game
      username - the username of the player posting the message
      message - the message to be posted
